xuiTimeframePicker
directive in module xui

Description

XUI TimeframePicker component that can be used for date and time range selection. The component allows manual input of two date and time values, or a quick selection from one of the predefined "Quick picks". Developer can provide his own "Quick picks" that are suitable for his own use case, otherwise the defaults are used from xuiTimeframeService.getDefaultPresets().

Usage

as element:
<xui-timeframe-picker
       ng-model="{xui.ITimeframe}"
       [presets="{[key:string]:xui.ITimeframePreset}"]
       [placeholder="{string}"]
       [datetime-title-format="{string}"]
       [custom-title="{string}"]
       [on-change="{function}"]
       [min-date="{date}"]
       [max-date="{date}"]>
</xui-timeframe-picker>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
ng-modelxui.ITimeframe

Data for the component.

presets
(optional)
[key:string]:xui.ITimeframePreset

Presets for the "Quick picks" section. Defaults are used (from xuiTimeframeService.getDefaultPresets()) when these are not specified.

placeholder
(optional)
string

Placeholder text to display when timeframe is not set.

datetimeTitleFormat
(optional)
string

Datetime format ('Moment' compatible) used for dates displayed in title.

(default: "MMM D, YYYY h:mm A")

customTitle
(optional)
string

Title that will be displayed for custom time range.

onChange
(optional)
function

(model)=>void Callback function which is executed if any changes are applied.

minDate
(optional)
date

Limits minimum available date.

maxDate
(optional)
date

Limits maximum available date.

Example
